array.name: C
array.summary: Operational variables - should not change over the duration of the task once set

column.name: C_MaxDuration
column.summary: Maximum time before automatic termination (minutes)

column.name: C_MaxDurationMsec
column.summary: Maximum time before automatic termination in msec (autogenerated)

column.name: C_LargeRewardLever
column.summary: Which is the large reward lever (Left=0 Right=1)

column.name: C_SmallRewardLicks
column.summary: Number off licks permitted for small reward

column.name: C_LargeRewardLicks
column.summary: Number off licks permitted for large reward - not used in training

column.name: C_TrialsPerBlock
column.summary: Number of trials executed per block before moving to next

column.name: C_CamUnconnectedState
column.summary: Used to store 'Unconnected' StateID of camera

column.name: C_CamConnectOkState
column.summary: Used to store 'Ok' StateID of camera

column.name: C_CamConnectFailState
column.summary: Used to store 'Fail' StateID of camera

variable.name: C(^C_LargeRewardLever)
variable.summary: Which is the large reward lever (Left=0 Right=1)

variable.name: C(^C_SmallRewardLicks)
variable.summary: How many licks are permitted for small reward

variable.name: C(^C_LargeRewardLicks)
variable.summary: How many licks are permitted for large reward

variable.name: C(^C_TrialsPerBlock)
variable.summary: How many licks are permitted for large reward

input.name: Inp_HeadEntry
input.summary: Input ID of the head entry unit on pellet dispenser

input.name: Inp_LeverTrigger
input.summary: Input ID of the fixed lever 'starting' trigger

input.name: Inp_LeverInputLeft
input.summary: Input ID of retractable lever on the left

input.name: Inp_LeverInputRight
input.summary: Input ID of retractable lever on the right

input.name: Inp_UltrasonicA
input.summary: Input ID of ultrasonic input 1 of 2

input.name: Inp_UltrasonicB
input.summary: Input ID of ultrasonic input 2 of 2

output.name: Out_LeftLeverRetract
output.summary: Output trigger to extend/retract left lever
output.use: Toggle extended state of lever; OFF->Not extended, ON->Extended

output.name: Out_RightLeverRetract
output.summary: Output trigger to extend/retract right lever
output.use: Toggle extended state of lever; OFF->Not extended, ON->Extended

output.name: Out_LickShockSwitch
output.summary: Output ID of ENV-250A Contact Lickometer switching unit.
output.use: OFF->Lickometer active, ON->Floor connected to shock emitter

output.name: Out_Ultrasonic
output.summary: Output ID of ultrasonic recording unit.

output.name: Out_ShockEmitter
output.use: Toggle shock delivery: OFF->No shock presently being delivered, ON->CONTINUOUS SHOCK PRESENTLY BEING DELIVERED

output.name: Out_HouseLightRear
output.summary: Output ID of rear-most house light.

output.name: Out_HouseLightMid
output.summary: Output ID of miidle house light.

output.name: Out_HouseLightFront
output.summary: Output ID of front-most house light.

constant.name: ZP_ExtendSipper
constant.summary: Trigger extend sipper; set S for max # of sips before retraction

constant.name: ZP_SipperLimitHit
constant.summary: Triggers when the sipper limit is hit; if S less than 0 then never triggered.

constant.name: ZP_RetractSipper
constant.summary: Trigger sipper retract, regardless of whether sipper limit hit

constant.name: ZP_TerminateExperiment
constant.summary: End the experiment - may be used if error occurrs

constant.name: ZP_HouseLightsOn
constant.summary: Turn on house lights

constant.name: ZP_HouseLightsOff
constant.summary: Turn off house lights

constant.name: ZP_StimLightsOn
constant.summary: Turns on all stimulus lights

constant.name: ZP_StimLightsMid
constant.summary: Switch on only middle stim light on

constant.name: ZP_StimLightsOff
constant.summary: Switch off all stim lights

constant.name: ZP_ExtendLeverSingle
constant.summary: Extend single lever determined by A(^A_CurrentLever)

constant.name: ZP_ExtendLeverAll
constant.summary: Extend all levers

constant.name: ZP_RetractLeverAll
constant.summary: Retract all levers

constant.name: ZP_DurationReached
constant.summary: Trigged when experiment reaches maximum time

constant.name: ZP_TrialTimerReached
constant.summary: Trigged when a single trial duration is reached

constant.name: ZP_TrialTimerStart
constant.summary: Used to start a 'trial timer'

constant.name: ZP_TimerStart
constant.summary: Used to start a 'timer' which will trigger a ZP_TimerReached when time passed - set V with delay milliseconds

constant.name: ZP_TimerReached
constant.summary: Triggered when the timer is triggered, and then reached

column.name: A_CompletedTrials
column.summary: The number of trials that have already been completed

column.name: A_SuccessfulTrials
column.summary: The number of trials that have been successfully completed (middle and side levers pressed)

column.name: A_CurrentHours
column.summary: Hours since commencement (for H:M:S.MS)

column.name: A_CurrentMinutes
column.summary: Minutes since commencement (for H:M:S.MS)

column.name: A_CurrentSeconds
column.summary: Seconds since commencement (for H:M:S.MS)

column.name: A_CurrentMilliseconds
column.summary: Milliseconds since commencement (for H:M:S.MS)

column.name: A_CurrentLever
column.summary: Current lever in use (Left vs. Right)

column.name: A_PrepTrialType
column.summary: Current preparatory trial (0=Small Reward 1=Large Reward)

column.name: A_CurrentBlock
column.summary: The current block of trials being executed

column.name: A_TrialsCompletedInBlock
column.summary: How many trials have been completed out of the current block

column.name: B_TrialNumber
column.summary: Number of this trial

column.name: B_TrialSuccessful
column.summary: Whether the trial was successful (No=0, Yes=1)

column.name: B_TrialBlock
column.summary: Trial block the trial belonged to - 0 if a 'pre-trial'

column.name: B_TrialTimeHour
column.summary: Time post-commencement (H) this trial occurred

column.name: B_TrialTimeMinute
column.summary: Time post-commencement (M) this trial occurred

column.name: B_TrialTimeSecond
column.summary: Time post-commencement (S) this trial occurred

column.name: B_TrialTimeMillisecond
column.summary: Time post-commencement (MS) this trial occurred

column.name: B_TrialMsec
column.summary: Time post-commencement (msec) this trial occurred TOTAL - Not related to H:M:S

column.name: B_CentrePressDelay
column.summary: Time (in msec) after start of this trial the centre lever was pressed; -1 if not pressed

column.name: B_SecondPressDelay
column.summary: Time (in msec) after start of this trial the retractable lever was pressed; -1 if not pressed

column.name: B_FalseCentreHits
column.summary: Number of times the centre lever was pressed after the retractable lever was extended

column.name: B_LeverPressed
column.summary: Which of the two retractable levers was pressed (0=Small reward 1=Large reward)

column.name: B_LickDelay
column.summary: Time (in msec) before lick count was reached; -1 = NA

column.name: B_LickCount
column.summary: Number of licks taken

column.name: B_FirstLickDelay
column.summary: Time (in msec) before first lick; -1 = NA

constant.name: B_TrialIndexMultiplier
constant.summary: Multiplier to be used for each trial

array.name: D
array.summary: Delay (s) of reward if 'delayed reward' - i.e. large reward - lever pressed - for each block

column.name: D_DelayTime
column.summary: Number of seconds before large reward offered if delay lever pressed - not used since there is only one column

variable.name: S
variable.summary: Number of sips remaining before sipper retract - set before using ZP_ExtendSipper

variable.name: V
variable.summary: Duration timer - Time to be delayed before ZP_TimerReached in seconds
